div.div: North Park Univ. vs. Alma College

tr.td: Noah Moore kickoff 51 yards to the ALMA14, T. Watters return 21 yards to the ALMA35 (Ryan Boswell).
R. Gibson rush for 3 yards to the ALMA38 (Trevor Forker;George Rodis).
T. Watters rush for 2 yards to the ALMA40, fumble forced by Brendon Dull, fumble by T. Watters recovered by NPU Ryan McCann at ALMA42.
NORTH PARK UNIV. drive start at 14:09.
T D. Conway pass complete to Dan Anderson for 2 yards to the ALMA40 (S. Young).
D J. Jones rush for 5 yards to the ALMA35 (C. Kempf).
TEAM rush for loss of 5 yards to the ALMA40 (C. Kempf).
